sourceOrganization.name: NIAID AViDD Centers
sourceOrganization.description: The AViDD Centers will conduct innovative, multidisciplinary research to develop candidate COVID-19 antivirals, especially those that can be taken in an outpatient setting, as well as antivirals targeting specific viral families with high potential to cause a pandemic in the future. For more information, visit the NIAID program page: https://www.niaid.nih.gov/research/antiviral-drug-discovery-centers-pathogens-pandemic-concern
